about_the_game:
~ CACILDES ADVENTURE ~

"A light-hearted soulslike about a kid and his journey to join the king's army."

~ EXPANSION #2: Veilglade Peninsula 🍍🌴🌊 - Released ~

"Travel to the Veilglades, a vibrant new region boasting a tropical island encircled by dazzling waves. But as night descends, an eerie threat looms over the isle. Plunge into an underwater, sunken college and unveil the dark secrets that haunt this forgotten place."

~ EXPANSION #1: Sunkenland 🏰 - Released ~

"Explore the Sunkenland, a new region packed with locations to discover, enemies to battle, and unique gear to acquire! Venture into the ancient dwarven keep concealed beneath the mountains and uncover the lost story of the Sundered people."

~ THE STARTING POINT 🥚~

You are Cacildes*, a young boy eagerly awaiting a letter from the King, which will determine your future in the King’s Army.

Meanwhile, your mother is worried: many chickens have gone missing. Driven by the threat of losing breakfast pancakes and other egg delicacies, you set out to find out what is going on.

* Character customization (name, appearance and gender) is available since version 1.1

~ BATTLE AWAITS⚔️ ~

Wield an arsenal of options to conquer your foes, from swords to shields, bows and magic; parry, counter-attack, attack from air and infuse your weapons with resins, throw bombs and lure enemies into ambushes - it's your choice!

~ A DYNAMIC WORLD 🏰 ~

Explore the many branching paths of the Slepbone region, a place on the brink of war between humans, orcs, and elves. Gather a party of companions or venture alone; discover secret bosses and carve out your reputation as a cruel or a noble knight of the king.

~ FEATURES ~

  • Combat heavily inspired by the soulslike genre, featuring dodges, parries, jump-attacks, guard-counters, posture-breaks, backstabs, one/two-handing weapons, bows, magic—you get the idea!

  • + 30 weapons, ranging from ultra greatswords to daggers, bows, magic staves, double scythes, or a bleeding mace—there's enough arsenal for any situation!

  • + 20 spells, from fireballs to raising skeletons from the dead, magic has you covered!

  • Become stronger, and choose wisely from 5 stats: Vitality, Endurance, Strength, Dexterity, and Intelligence.

  • Fight alone or alongside trusty companions, who'll tag along and make your journey easier.

  • Appearances matter!, People will comment if you're naked, and you can use certain armors like the thief set to avoid fighting certain thieves.

  • Day and night cycle, with different people and enemies appearing at different times of day.

  • Your actions have impact, If you have lower reputation, people will lock their doors. Faith spells also scale with your reputation!

  • Be who you want to be!, You can rename Cacildes, change his appearance, gender, and avatar portrait!

  • Embark on New Game Plus, and bring your hard-earned weapons with you!

  • Craft potions, with recipes and ingredients scattered around the world!

  • Upgrade your weapons, by finding iron ores

  • And more is coming! With new adventures on the horizon, you can count on frequent updates with bug fixes and additional content every so often!

name: Cacildes Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2070
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A light-hearted soulslike about a kid and his journey to join the king's army.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
